titles.title: Providing for a conditional adjournment of the House of Representatives and a conditional recess or adjournment of the Senate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 190 (Roll no. 43).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 2/15/2013--Passed Senate without amendment. Declares that when the House adjourns on any legislative day from Friday, February 15, 2013, through Thursday, February 21, 2013, it stand adjourned until 2 p.m. on Monday, February 25, 2013. Declares that when the Senate recesses or adjourns on Friday, February 15, 2013, it stand recessed or adjourned until noon on Monday, February 25, 2013.
